function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential risky behavior related to food serving alone due to unemployment and inability to afford personal protective equipment like facemasks","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to lack of protective measures during food serving activities","Mitigation":"Provide affordable or subsidized personal protective equipment to unemployed individuals, and enforce regulations for safe food serving practices","Technologies":"Affordable and reusable face masks, contactless food delivery technology","People":"Unemployed individuals, food service workers","Owner":"Government, food service establishments"},{"Description":"Gender disparities in healthcare workers' health practices affecting COVID-19 prevention efforts","Impact":"Worse health practices in COVID-19 prevention among male healthcare workers compared to female healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Targeted education and awareness programs for male healthcare workers, and gender-specific interventions for promoting better health practices","Technologies":"Health education materials, gender-specific intervention programs","People":"Male healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Socio-demographic characteristics correlating with knowledge about COVID-19","Impact":"Limited knowledge about COVID-19 among certain socio-demographic groups, potentially leading to misinformation and lack of preventive measures","Mitigation":"Education campaigns targeted at specific socio-demographic groups, and promotion of diverse information channels for learning about COVID-19","Technologies":"Information dissemination platforms, targeted educational materials","People":"Specific socio-demographic groups","Owner":"Public health agencies, educational institutions"}]}
